Name: Tririga-Browse
Synopsis: Opens a TRIRIGA installation directory path

Name: Tririga-Enter
Synopsis: Starts a remote powershell session to a server

Name: Tririga-Import-Omp
Synopsis: Uploads and imports a local OMP zip file to TRIRIGA

Name: Tririga-Instances
Synopsis: Prints all known instances in a given environment

Name: Tririga-RDP
Synopsis: Opens an RDP client connection to the TRIRIGA server

Name: Tririga-Status
Synopsis: Get the current status of TRIRIGA service

Name: Tririga-Upload-Omp
Synopsis: Uploads a local OMP zip file to TRIRIGA

Name: Enable-TririgaWorkflowInstance
Synopsis: Sets the workflow instance recording setting to ALWAYS

Name: Get-TririgaActiveUsers
Synopsis: Gets a list of currently logged in users

Name: Get-TririgaAdminUsers
Synopsis: Gets a list of users who can access the TRIRIGA Admin Console

Name: Get-TririgaAgentHost
Synopsis: Gets the configured host(s) for the given agent(s)

Name: Get-TririgaSummary
Synopsis: Gets basic information about a TRIRIGA instance
